tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am a first time dentist visitor and was this a peaceful experience for me.
Dr. Shradha was extremely patient and professional with me and my fears. She also explained each step so that I did not panic during the process .
I got a root canal done for two of my tooth. It was a pleasant experience with the staff as well who followed up the appointments and scheduled the visits.
I highly recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to the doctor for my RCT and CAP as well as a tooth extraction. I felt very at ease with the way the doctor explained the technicalities as well as the preventive measures. It aided me in having a painless surgery. I would recommend it to anyone who is experiencing tooth pain or needs consultation.

review: I visited Dr. Shradha Das for my bleeding gums problem. She examined properly and she explained the problem clearly. she is very friendly and professional. she has completed the procedure with a personal care. She clearly made me aware of dental care and dental hygiene. Completely satisfied with the treatment. Since you are reading this review, I suggest you visit her clinic once and you will agree with me. Keep Smiling üôÇ.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shradha was recommended by my brother who has been consulting the Doctor for the last 4 years. I was able to get an appointment quickly. On visiting the clinic, i was greeted pleasantly by the Doctors assistant. Post recording my contact details, I was able to meet Dr Shradha who spoke politely and gathering my requirements and concerns. She examined and suggested the next steps. Scaling was done and the Wisdom tooth extraction done skillfully. I would recommend Dental Bay/Dr Shradha Das.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shradha has been our family dentist ever since she open her clinic here. She is very dedicated and she makes visiting the "feared" dentist a pleasurable experience. So much so my grandson is the only child I know who finds lots of excuses to consult Dr. Shardha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shradha is great at her work, she does everything with a smile. She would explain everything very nicely. She would make you feel as comfortable as possible. Once you visit her, you would agree that she is a lovely person and a very efficient doctor.
